function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of inaccurate medical information","Impact":"Potential for devastating consequences if patients follow inaccurate medical advice","Mitigation":"Promote accurate and verified medical information through trusted channels, educate the public on evaluating sources","Technologies":"Health information verification tools, educational campaigns","People":"Non-doctors, patients, general public","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, medical professionals"},{"Description":"Overconfidence and misinformation among physicians","Impact":"Incorrect medical advice and treatment, leading to suboptimal patient care","Mitigation":"Continual education and training on evidence-based practices, promoting humility in medical decision-making","Technologies":"Medical evidence databases, decision support systems","People":"Physicians, medical professionals","Owner":"Medical education institutions, professional medical associations"},{"Description":"Public trust in medical professionals","Impact":"Consequences of patients mistrusting medical advice, seeking unverified information","Mitigation":"Transparency in medical decision-making, open communication with patients, building trust through consistent evidence-based practices","Technologies":"Telemedicine platforms, patient education tools","People":"Patients, general public","Owner":"Medical professionals, healthcare organizations"}]}
